Package logic

Class Drinks

java.lang.Object
logic.Item
logic.Drinks
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Drinks extends Item implements Serializable
Drinks represents a drink item in the restaurant menu. This class extends the abstract Item class.

  • Constructor Details

    • Drinks

      public Drinks(int itemID, String itemName, Category categoryName, String description, float cost, Size size)
      Constructs a Drinks item with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      itemID - The unique ID of the drink item.
      itemName - The name of the drink item.
      categoryName - The category to which the drink item belongs.
      description - A brief description of the drink item.
      cost - The cost of the drink item.
      size - The size of the drink.
